questions.question: With the help of her watcher, Ruper Giles, she fights the undead in a long running sci fi series
She and Fox Mulder track paranormal activities for the FBI
Her triangular boobs have kept teenagers rivited since her first game in 1996
She was in command of the starship that was taken across the galaxy by the Caretaker
She goes by the callsign "Starbuck" when she flies her Viper into battle
